text: Kill Bill is an American martial arts crime movie directed by Quentin Tarantino. It was released in two parts; Volume 1 and Volume 2. In most countries it is rated for adult viewing only because of extreme violence and profanity. == Cast == * Sonny Chiba as Hanz≈ç Hattori == Other websites == * Category:2003 movies Category:2004 movies Category:American crime movies Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Quentin Tarantino Category:Martial arts movies
title: Kill Bill
